title: Stunning!
review: Rarely does a sequel come along holding true to the original like this one. The story line is so related to the original that you are instantly drawn to the characters with a twist here and a turn there. Thought provoking with cinematography and sound on such a grand scale as to blow your mind! A glimpse of what the world could be like if we're not careful and don't drink to much liquid, you might miss something.
